skillTree.name: Elven Steed
skillTree.description: The best of all horse breeds found anywhere in the world, Elven steeds are noble, intelligent, graceful, and swift.

skillTree.name: Great Eagle
skillTree.description: Ulthuan's Great Eagles are the firm allies of the Elves, fighting their causes since the coming of Chaos.

skillTree.name: Griffon
skillTree.description: The wild Griffons of Ulthuan are creatures of noble bearing and keen intelligence, with whom Elves form bonds that only death can shatter.

skillTree.name: Moon Dragon
skillTree.description: Those who ride atop the mighty Moon Drakes are steeled in the knowledge of their mount’s enlightened, Daemon-slaying strength.

skillTree.name: Star Dragon
skillTree.description: The eldest, most powerful Dragons can destroy entire units with a molten blast of their white-hot breath.

skillTree.name: Speed of Asuryan
skillTree.description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Asuryan
skillTree.description: Asuryan's adherents believe they are part of the Creator's plan and will never be abandoned.

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Hoeth
skillTree.description: The supporters of Hoeth bask in their patron's generosity, for it was he who gifted the Elves with much of their revered knowledge.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Swordmasters of Hoeth units
Upkeep: -5% for Swordmasters of Hoeth units

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Vaul
skillTree.description: The God of Smiths knows the Elves will need fire and fury to survive; his blessings steel them for the darker days ahead.

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Kurnous
skillTree.description: Isha's husband is the father of all Elves; his blessings are given to those who hunt for food, but woe betide those who kill for sport.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for White Lions of Chrace, War Lions and Lion Chariot units
Upkeep: -5% for White Lions of Chrace, War Lions and Lion Chariot units

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Isha
skillTree.description: The Goddess of Fertility blesses farmers and mothers, but also those votaries who are caught abroad in dangerous lands.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Spearmen, Rangers and Archers units
Upkeep: -5% for Spearmen, Rangers and Archers units

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Addaioth
skillTree.description: Those who follow the Bringer of Wrath and Fire are blessed with direct and forceful solutions to the obstacles in their way.

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Mathlann
skillTree.description: As the Lord of the Sea, Mathlann is patron to sailors and explorers; he is prayed to by Elves about to embark on a voyage or seeking new lands.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Lothern Sea Guard units
Upkeep: -5% for Lothern Sea Guard units

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Hukon
skillTree.description: If you can hold you ground when all around are falling into the cracks, then that's the patronage of Hukon, God of Earthquakes.

skillTree.name: Seeking Arrows
skillTree.description: These enchanted arrows have been carefully crafted from the pale-wooded trees that grow near the Grove of Avelorn.

skillTree.name: Valour of Ages
skillTree.description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen

skillTree.name: Deadeye
skillTree.description: Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Militia Master
skillTree.description: Turning an untrained bunch of regular citizens into effective fighting units requires a special kind of talent, and oodles of patience.

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Melee attack: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Melee attack: +8 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Melee defence: +8 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units

skillTree.name: Bow Master
skillTree.description: Missile combat isn't always about attacking; knowing how to defend also pays dividends.

effects.description: Ammunition: +8% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
Ammunition: +12% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
Reload time reduction: +7% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
Ammunition: +20% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units

skillTree.name: Cavalry Master
skillTree.description: Years of experience in mounted combat has started to pay off; this one is always in command of both their force and its steeds.

effects.description: Speed: +5% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Missile strength: +9% for Ellyrian Reavers units
Speed: +7% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Charge bonus: +9 for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Missile strength: +12% for Ellyrian Reavers units
Speed: +10% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Charge bonus: +12 for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units

skillTree.name: Vanguard Master
skillTree.description: Being present at the very forefront of the assault, on many occasions, prepares one for future engagements of a similar nature.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +6 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
Melee attack: +6 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
Missile strength: +9% for Tiranoc Chariot units
Charge bonus: +9 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
Melee attack: +8 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
Missile strength: +12% for Tiranoc Chariot units
Charge bonus: +12 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units

skillTree.name: Sky Master
skillTree.description: The firmament holds no fear for this one, such is their command of the many airborne beasts of battle.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +6% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
Weapon strength: +9% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
Charge bonus: +9 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
Weapon strength: +12% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
Charge bonus: +12 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units

skillTree.name: Master Strategist
skillTree.description: Knowing that it is the rare plan that survives contact with the enemy, yet being prepared for all eventualities, raises this one above mere planners.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
Melee attack: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
Melee defence: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
Melee attack: +8 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
Melee defence: +8 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units

skillTree.name: Immovable Force
skillTree.description: Like a wall of the hardest stone imaginable - such is their ability to withstand attack.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
Magic resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Favourable Winds
skillTree.description: When the gale always blows in the direction of your choosing, failure becomes a rare event indeed.

effects.description: Missile strength: +12% for Archers and Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +10 for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 10% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Silver Torrent
skillTree.description: Speed, agility and control - all must be mastered if your crushing tide is to break perfectly upon enemy shores.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Heart of the Flame
skillTree.description: The very centre of the fire always burns the hottest.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: 5% for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Merchant Lord
skillTree.description: “Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.”

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Elven Healing
skillTree.description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description: Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Elven Scholar
skillTree.description: Far removed from the petty squabbles of other races, many High Elves are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Slovenly
backgroundSkills.description: Everything is such an effort - they'd much rather feast than fight.

effects.description: Upkeep: +10% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard and Ellyrian Reaver units

backgroundSkills.name: Keen
backgroundSkills.description: Sitting around waiting for something to happen is not their style.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard and Ellyrian Reaver units

backgroundSkills.name: Ardent
backgroundSkills.description: More than keen, this one is positively champing at the bit to get up and at the enemy.

effects.description: Upkeep: -30% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard and Ellyrian Reaver units
Range: +10% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard and Ellyrian Reaver Archers units

backgroundSkills.name: Tardy
backgroundSkills.description: This one would be late for their own funeral pyre if it were possible!

effects.description: Upkeep: +30% for Chariot and Eagle Claw Bolt Thrower units

backgroundSkills.name: Example
backgroundSkills.description: In battle, this one is a shining example for others to follow - and the foe to run away from!

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for Chariot and Eagle Claw Bolt Thrower units
Reload time reduction: +5% for Eagle Claw Bolt Thrower units

backgroundSkills.name: Exemplar
backgroundSkills.description: A paragon of martial excellence, with few peers among their own kind, let alone the enemy.

effects.description: Upkeep: -30% for Chariot and Eagle Claw Bolt Thrower units
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Chariot units (minimum 1)
Reload time reduction: +20% for Eagle Claw Bolt Thrower units

backgroundSkills.name: Dullard
backgroundSkills.description: There's dull, boring, and inattentive... and there's this live wire.

backgroundSkills.name: Careful
backgroundSkills.description: When this one plans an ambush, every possible option is considered. Nothing is left to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Vigilant
backgroundSkills.description: Ever watchful, this one bides their time until precisely the right moment to attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Feeble
backgroundSkills.description: It's surprising that this one can even lift a pen, let alone a sword.

backgroundSkills.name: Well-Founded
backgroundSkills.description: Always considered, never rushing to judge, all conclusions based on empirical evidence, no conjecture.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: The strength at the base of the pillar.

backgroundSkills.name: Inaccurate
backgroundSkills.description: This one couldn't hit an Ogre at ten yards, let alone a ravening pack of Skaven!

backgroundSkills.name: Accurate
backgroundSkills.description: This one can hit an Ogre at one hundred yards, and a ravening pack of Skaven at fifty!

backgroundSkills.name: Hawk-Eyed
backgroundSkills.description: You have to get up very early if you want to beat this one; nothing escapes their keen eye and lightning reflexes.

backgroundSkills.name: Unfortunate
backgroundSkills.description: Locking themselves out of rooms; that bad batch of oysters; the one stray arrow - this one is more than simply unlucky!

backgroundSkills.name: Fortuitous
backgroundSkills.description: Chance is like magic - it can be harnessed to the individual's will.

backgroundSkills.name: Charmed
backgroundSkills.description: There must be runes about their person - no one could be this lucky otherwise!

backgroundSkills.name: Poltroon
backgroundSkills.description: When their army charges towards the foe, this one can clearly be seen legging it in the opposite direction!

backgroundSkills.name: Resolute
backgroundSkills.description: Unswerving and determined, this one is an immovable force on the battlefield.

backgroundSkills.name: Dashing
backgroundSkills.description: You can almost see the hearts fluttering when this one passes by, on their way to derring-do and adventure.

effects.description: Upkeep: -30% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Weapon strength: +20% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Missile strength: +20% for Ellyrian Reavers units

backgroundSkills.name: Soft-Hearted
backgroundSkills.description: Kindness and consideration are virtues. No, really, they are!

effects.description: Missile strength: -5% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Ellyrian Reaver Archers, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Chariot units

backgroundSkills.name: Retaliatory
backgroundSkills.description: Revenge is not a dish best served cold; it is always perfectly sweet, no matter the temperature.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
Missile strength: +10% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Ellyrian Reaver Archers, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Chariot units

backgroundSkills.name: Punitive
backgroundSkills.description: It's always someone's fault. They can always be made to pay.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors
Missile strength: +10% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Ellyrian Reaver Archers, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Chariot units

backgroundSkills.name: Indolent
backgroundSkills.description: Someone less suited to bodily activity it would be hard to find.

backgroundSkills.name: Brisk
backgroundSkills.description: Why walk when you can run? Why run when you can fly?

backgroundSkills.name: Energetic
backgroundSkills.description: Always animated, this one has an infectious vitality about them.
